pr_title: chore: turn on execution plans feature

timeline.message:
chore: turn on execution plans feature

This patch turns on the execution plans feature for interactive mode, and contains a few changes:
- drops the feature flag
- drops the whitelist of planned test cases
- adds test case plans for all the happy-case qtts

timeline.bodyText: If you've changed the text output when a stream is created, you should probably update the docs in the repo to match.
timeline.author: big-andy-coates
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -262,7 +262,7 @@ private void testCreateStreamAsSelect(
     assertRunCommand(
         queryString,
         anyOf(
-            isRow(containsString("Stream " + streamName.toUpperCase() + " created and running")),
+            isRow(containsString("Created query with ID CSAS_" + streamName)),
